item.title: How to install Alfresco Community Edition 5.1 in Ubuntu Server 14.04
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to install Alfresco Community Edition 5.1 in Ubuntu Server 14.04. In this example, Ubuntu Server is a virtual machine made by VirtualBox. Requirements Ubuntu Server virtual machine with: Two network adapters: NAT adapter (eth0) Host-only adapter (eth1) with a static IP address -> 192.168.56.101 Base memory: 4608 Mb 2 CPUs Alfresco Community Edition binary file -> alfresco-community-installer-201604-linux-x64.bin Check out how to install Ubuntu Server on VirtualBox to get ready a virtual machine to install Alfresco Community Edition.
